titles.title: Now We Have Seen Our Title Clear

verse.name: v1
v2
v3
v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Now when we praise, and when we shout, And when with saints we meet, We join in one triumphant voice From out the mercy seat.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}As I look down from my Lord’s throne, It’s heaven’s roof I see. All things of heaven, of earth and hell, Are ‘neath my Lord and me.{/lang-eng}
